𒀖 ≈ 𒌋𒋰 ≠ 𒌋𒑙 ≈ 𒀫 ⇔ 𒋰𒌋𒋰𒁹 ≈ 𒋰𒋰𒁹 𒀊 AB ⇔ 𒍨
𒀖 AP AB₂ •alp alpha ≈ 𒀖 ≈ 𒌋𒋰 ≈ 𒌋𒑙 ≈ 𒀫 aˡbūru bull
𒍱 AB×A ABAᵗ a bath
𒀖 ≠ 𒁷 ≠ 𒆕 taur 𒋫 𒄞 Apis 𒀖 ≠ 𒆨 piš fish
𒀖 AP ≈ 𒌋𒋰 α Apis alpha bull 𓃒 water-buffalo
𒀖 arhu arḫum | 𓇋 𓎛 𓃾 | ox Vieh, Fiecher ⇔ 𒀉𒄞 a₂gud "ox" arhu < ar’pará > alp

𒀖 L'AB 𒀚 Leib LIBIŠ "body"

𒀖 LID lebt al'apit lived livestock let beget a-lid-di 𒀀𒀖𒁲 alived
𒀖 lit/liṭ/lid @ pot = 𒆕 Du{cul} Deckel vs 𒁷 DIN/DON

𒄞 alpu α 𓂸𓂹

𒀖𒄞𒄭𒀀 ÁB.GUD.ḪI.A alpu-govedo говедо cattle

𓃾 α al’phal : the bull
𓃽 α al’pará : the cow פָּרָה 𓃖

𓃾 α > 𒀖 AP 𓐑𓊪𓃒 ‘Apis’ Alpvieh

𒀖 A'fish 𒆩 pisces 𒃴 vs 𒉏 NIM 𒈾 𓆛 Fisch ⋍ Fass 𓎿 in Elamite
𒀖 A'fish 𒀖 𒄩 = 𒀊𒄩 ≈ 𒀊𒄘𒁕 AB-gu2-da cod vs cattle 𒄞 gud

AP 𒀖 ⋍ 💧 AB 𒀊 water 𒀀 💧

𓇋 𓎛 𓃾 | bull | 𒀖 arhu < •parhu פָּרָה pará بقرة bagara
𓇋 𓎛 𓃾 | bull | 𒀖 arhu < গরু gôru গোরু goru गोरूप gorūpa, “cattle-like” кра́ва kráva

𒉈 𒂗 𒀖 𒈬 Nah en bul min : This is my cow
